revised_title: Spectroscopic Analysis of Samarium and Mercury Vapour Interference
tldr: The author investigates the spectroscopic properties of Samarium and discovers a new spectrum characterized by a strong red and a double orange band. They also study the interference of mercury vapour in spectroscopic analysis and develop a method to minimize its impact. This research contributes to the understanding of elemental properties and the development of more accurate spectroscopic techniques.
